overview: Relive moments from the case with analysis from top experts. Never Before Seen Footage, Evidence, and Interviews. Mock Trial on how it should've been done. If you like court television or crime dramas, you'll enjoy Absolutely 100% Guilty. It is the Trial of the Century.
tagline: "In 24 years of working homicide, I'd never had a crime scene I had more physical evidence at." - Philip Van Etter
title: Absolutely 100% Guilty
